name: HOW TO BOAT
description:
ALL ABOARD!

"This is your Captain speaking. We are experiencing some troublesome weather and the waves might get quite big and terrifying. But don't fret my little sea critters, I your Captain will get us safely through this quagmire, whatever it takes. Even if I have to sacrifice every last one of you to Poseidon... "

Get enough speed to clear the waves, by throwing innocent people off of your boat.

LESS Passengers = MORE Speed

Controls: click on passengers to aim and launch them
